While backpacking through europe I was determined to eat all the delicious food I could possibly fit in my body. I was looking online for churros and discovered this place was minutes away from the Sagrada Familia church which I has a scheduled tour of in the morning. Seems like destiny if you ask me. I walked over there and orders the cream filled churro and the dulce de Leche filled churro. Honestly the best churros I have ever had in my life. They were massive and the filling was divine.  I preferred the cream filling because it was nice and light buy if you love dulce de Leche trust me when I say they do not skimp out.  Definitely worth a try!
